channel.title: Two questions [pi]
channel.description: I have two questions today. I made a custom minigame and to get into the waiting room you need to enter a portal. 1. how can i make it so only 16 people can get in the waiting room? 2. How can i make it so when you click on the portal, all your equipped items get unequipped?

item.title: Two questions [pi]
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:2, topic:406227”]So do a check for how many players online are in the waiting room, if there >= 16 then send a message that the waiting room is full, otherwise playersInWaitingRoom += 1;.

Then find the case that teleports you to where ever when you click the portal object and do a removeEquipmentToInventory or whatever it may be called.[/quote]
Thanks but can you help me come up with the first one? Like how to make it check?

Read full topic

item.title: Two questions [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

So do a check for how many players online are in the waiting room, if there >= 16 then send a message that the waiting room is full, otherwise playersInWaitingRoom += 1;.

Then find the case that teleports you to where ever when you click the portal object and do a removeEquipmentToInventory or whatever it may be called.

Read full topic
